ResourceHeader.ResourceName: OMTI All-Sky Imager Data taken alternately with various filters at Sata
ResourceHeader.Description: Optical Mesosphere Thermosphere Imagers (OMTI) All-Sky Imager Data obtained with various filters at Sata, Japan
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Optical Mesosphere Thermosphere Imagers All-Sky Imager Data. PI: Kazuo Shiokawa and Yuichi Otsuka, Institute for Space-Earth Environmental Research, Nagoya University, Furo-cho, Chikusa-ku, Nagoya, Aichi 464-8601, Japan. Rules of the Road for OMTI ASI Data Use: 1. Please contact the Principal Investigator (PI), K. Shiokawa (shiokawa at isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp) or Y. Otsuka, ISEE, Nagoya University before using the data at any publications and/or presentations. 2. Please cite Shiokawa et al. (1999) and/or Shiokawa et al. (2009) in the publication. The detailed citation is: * Shiokawa et al., Earth Planets Space, 51, p.887-896, 1999. * Shiokawa et al., Earth Planets Space, 61, p.479-491, 2009. For more information, see http://stdb2.isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp/omti/

NumericalData.Keyword: EARTH SCIENCE Sun-earth Interactions Ionosphere/Magnetosphere Dynamics Ion Chemistry/Ionization

Parameter.Name: epoch for image
Parameter.Description: Time for which image data are taken, in double-decision Unix time

Parameter.Name: epoch for image in the "yyyy mm dd hh mm ss" format
Parameter.Description: Time for which image data are taken, in an array containing year, month, day, hour, minute, and second as integers

Parameter.Name: Exposure time
Parameter.Description: Exposure time in second for which the CCD count is integrated to take each image.

Parameter.Name: raw image data taken with the 486.1 nm filter
Parameter.Description: Raw image data of H-beta emission taken with the 486.1 nm filter as 512x512 pixel or 256x256 pixel. The unit is count/sample.

Parameter.Name: raw image data taken with the 557.7 nm filter
Parameter.Description: Raw image data of OI emission taken with the 557.7 nm filter as 512x512 pixel or 256x256 pixel. The unit is count/sample.

Parameter.Name: raw image data taken with the 572.5 nm filter
Parameter.Description: Raw image data of background taken with the 572.5 nm filter as 512x512 pixel or 256x256 pixel. The unit is count/sample.

Parameter.Name: raw image data taken with the 589.3 nm filter
Parameter.Description: Raw image data of Na emission taken with the 589.3 nm filter as 512x512 pixel or 256x256 pixel. The unit is count/sample.

Parameter.Name: raw image data taken with the 630.0 nm filter
Parameter.Description: Raw image data of OI emission taken with the 630.0 nm filter as 512x512 pixel or 256x256 pixel. The unit is count/sample.

Parameter.Name: raw image data taken with the longer-than-720.0 nm or 720.0-910.0 nm filter
Parameter.Description: Raw image data of OH emission taken with the longer-than-720.0 nm or 720.0-910.0 nm filter as 512x512 pixel or 256x256 pixel. The unit is count/sample.

Parameter.Name: raw image data taken with the 732.0 nm filter
Parameter.Description: Raw image data of OI emission taken with the 732.0 nm filter as 512x512 pixel or 256x256 pixel. The unit is count/sample.

Parameter.Name: raw image data taken with the 777.4 nm filter
Parameter.Description: Raw image data of OI emission taken with the 777.4 nm filter as 512x512 pixel or 256x256 pixel. The unit is count/sample.

Parameter.Name: raw image data taken with the 844.6 nm filter
Parameter.Description: Raw image data of OI emission taken with the 844.6 nm filter as 512x512 pixel or 256x256 pixel. The unit is count/sample.

Parameter.Name: raw image data taken with the 865.0 nm filter
Parameter.Description: Raw image data of O2 emission taken with the 865.0 nm filter as 512x512 pixel or 256x256 pixel. The unit is count/sample.
